pdf.title: Wide-scope analysis of veterinary drug and pesticide residues in animal feed by liquid chromatography coupled to quadrupole-time-of-flight mass spectrometry
pdf.reference: Acknowledgements The authors gratefully acknowledge the Spanish Ministry of Economy and Competitiveness (MINECO) and FEDER for financial support (Project Ref. AGL2010-21370). M.M.A.L. acknowl- edges her grant (F.P.U.) (MINECO, Ref. AP2008-02811). R.R.G. is also grateful for personal funding through the Ramón y Cajal Program (MINECO-ESF). P.P.B. gratefully acknowledges personal funding through the Agrifood Campus of International Excellence, ceiA3 (Spanish Ministry of Education, Culture and Sport).
